paragraphs.text:
%md

# PSQL - JDBC Konfiguration

* Wichtig:  einen *neuen* JDBC Interpreter erstellen

![Create](https://github.com/it-gro/zep-note-demos-db-01/raw/master/img/psql_driver_01.jpg)

msg.data:
PSQL - JDBC Konfiguration

  • Wichtig: einen neuen JDBC Interpreter erstellen

paragraphs.text:
%md

* Default User
```text
default.user               myadmin
default.password           dbAdmin
```

* JDBC Treiber
Dependencies, artifact 
```text
/usr/share/java/postgresql.jar
```

* Es düfen keine Punkte `.` in den Bezeichnern verwendet werden

* weitere Verbindungen
```text
sb-db-01_myadmin.driver             com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
sb-db-01_myadmin.url                jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/
sb-db-01_myadmin.user               myadmin
sb-db-01_myadmin.password           dbAdmin
sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.driver      com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.url         jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/pagila
sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.user        myadmin
sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.password    dbAdmin
```

msg.data:
• Default User

    default.user               myadmin
default.password           dbAdmin

  • JDBC Treiber
    Dependencies, artifact 

    /usr/share/java/postgresql.jar

  • Es düfen keine Punkte . in den Bezeichnern verwendet werden

  • weitere Verbindungen

sb-db-01_myadmin.url                jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/

sb-db-01_myadmin.password           dbAdmin
sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.driver      com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.url         jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/pagila

sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.password    dbAdmin

msg.data:
Config-File

Die Angaben werden automatisch in conf/interpreter.json geschrieben

        "sb-db-01_myadmin.driver": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_myadmin.driver",
          "value": "org.postgresql.Driver",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_myadmin.url": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_myadmin.url",
          "value": "jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_myadmin.user": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_myadmin.user",
          "value": "myadmin",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_myadmin.password": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_myadmin.password",
          "value": "dbAdmin",
          "type": "password"
        },

        "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.driver": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.driver",
          "value": "org.postgresql.Driver",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.url": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.url",
          "value": "jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/pagila",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.user": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.user",
          "value": "myadmin",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.password": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_pagila_myadmin.password",
          "value": "dbAdmin",
          "type": "password"
        },
